## verifyRelease() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Verifies the release before publishing.

This hook validates that the proposed version bump matches (or exceeds) what the API changes require.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function verifyRelease(pluginConfig: PluginConfig, context: SemanticReleaseContext): void;
```

**Returns:**

void

## Exceptions

Error if validation fails in validate mode
